title: PLEASE STOP BUILDING THE ENTIRE RUNNANS HURRICANE FIRST

replies.body:
Build BF Sword.

Then Runaan's Hurricane.

I'm fairly new at LoL, but I learned that pretty early from videos and build guides. BFS then Runaans... I favor Ashe and Jinx.

My doubt is that if you're killed or have to go to Base and don't have the 1350... I guess if one has the 875 go for Pickaxe...then Runaans, later Infinity Edge.
Then, if you don't have the 875? Not buy anything until you have 1350? Get boots, Long Swords or Dagger that are part of future planned items?

its a stop gap item, after you have {{item:1055}} which gives +8 ad +3%lifesteal +80 with a {{item:1083}} is +7 ad +3 hp on hit so every auto you get back 3hp and +1 gold for 100 cs then gives a bonus at 100cs of 350 gold. if you take the stats of both items compared to a {{item:1053}} which cost  900 gold the same amount as {{item:1055}} {{item:1083}} and gives +15 ad +10% life steal... well {{item:1083}} {{item:1055}} combined is 900 gold gives +15 ad +80 hp +3% lifesteal +3hp per auto +1 per cs (100 total) +350 gold bonus and then you sale {{item:1083}} for 180 gold. its a net gain of 180 gold and free stats. so in all reality it is more gold efficient to go {{item:1055}} {{item:1083}} over an early {{item:1053}} {{item:1037}} only down side it dont build into other items but you can hang on to both as you build your other items and sale when needed.
Yes.
MF should never be building that. How would that even help her?

> [{quoted}](name=Great Muta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uyZvl5eE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-22T18:41:07.361+0000)
>
> MF should never be building that. How would that even help her?

wave clear.

It would help her clear waves, AFTER she gets BF sword. She doesnt need to finish reaver/infinity edge first, but if she does little damage, her passive on runnans is going to do nothing at all to the minions.
Shiv or the other one that extends the range would do the same thing only better.
MF shouldn't be building the hurricane at all. If it doesn't have armor penetration or AD, MF doesn't need to touch it.
What if its a twitch?  There are some adc that actually do pretty well rushing the full item.

If it's a Twitch, he should be getting a ghostblade as his first item. Very strong opener, should definitely come before hurricane.

Even if he isn't going for the ghostblade build, Twitch should have a bf sword first in the vast majority of scenarios. I wouldn't deviate from that unless I was in a 2v1 lane. The early damage is just too important for trading.

Twitch isn't much of an early trader tbh.  I think the aoe dot stack, attack speed, and the dmg he gets on ult will actually give him a higher dps in a fight than a BF would.  Generally I see twitchs being more successful early with a couple attack speed items over raw AD add ons.

Dont have a solid answer for that, but I think atleast a small damage amount is needed. Think about BF sword, its 1300 for 40 damage flat.
Thats kinda expensive, but theres no harm in picking up pickaxe, and then going runnans.
I was just pointing out there is a small demographic and certain playstyles that will actually benefit from having the hurricane effect as fast as possible.
